(of fish) covered in flour, then fried in butter, and served with a sauce made from parsley and lemon juice: sole meuniere Sole meunière is so simple to prepare at home. I recommend the sole Meunière with autumn vegetables. We sampled Creole specialities like barbecue shrimp or trout Meuniere. They offer cold smoked softshell crabs that are deep-fried and served with a meuniere sauce.
